bow: was mom shamed by pediatrician for only having child my year old son normal dr is family practitioner hes been having minor issue that his normal dr had run tests for and everything came back normal but as an added precaution referred us to pediatrician in case there was something he was thinking of we have our appointment this week with the pediatrician woman in her late 50 she runs through an whole list of questions about my son and our medical and family histories she determines things are normal with my son and then proceeds to ask so when are you having your next child now insanely used to this question ve heard it practically weekly since my son was born but was taken aback hearing it from medical professional so give my standard answer oh we re only having one he keeps us busy enough as it is ca imagine having more this usually suffices but she kept going what you need to give him sibling see so many bad parents who have too many kids good parents like you need to have more is the best number girls and boys is perfect she went on for while all in front of my son just kept repeating myself and reaffirming our decision but inside kept switching between wanting to punch her and wanting to cry actually would love another but my husband is firmly one and done love our family and it taken me lot of reflecting to be happy with what we have and come to terms with not having another this woman was singlehandedly unraveling years of emotional work going to tell my sons normal dr about it and hopefully he stops referring future patients to her do know why writing this think just need to vent hugs so sorry also firmly one and done my husband is the one who would love more and always hate it when the question comes up usually tell people that since my son was preemie and had really bad ppd done most don push the issue after that gah what thoughtless doctor so sorry she said all that and in front of your son what if you were unable to have more like it just thoughtless ☹️ oh wow at first it sounded like she was trying to pay you compliment by affirming you are good parent but put her foot in her mouth instead but then she kept going and pushing the issue want to be angry for you but my gut reaction is just that she is icky and cringing really hard on your behalf have asked her how many kids she had and if she had any nanny but little bit savage like that waayyyyyy inappropriate as if you could even choose to have and she has and put herself through medical school while caring for them so because only work part time have plenty of time to have more babies her exact words icky describes it perfectly um not to mention if you did have who says it would be two boys and two girls like you have control over that geesh right could end up like my neighbor with boys they never have day without something getting broken in their home if not property its bones that is strange and creepy sorry you had that experience omg that is completely unprofessional would find some way to speak with her and explain to her how inappropriate she was if she defends herself and doesn see what she did as wrong would find some way to report her or at least document complaint online or something right as medical professional she should understand that not an option for anyone not doing ivf this sounds like conversation that would happen in utah how unprofessional sorry you had to deal with that so mad for you that incredibly unprofessional plus four kids why to work the farm every morning before dawn im like you and have one even the thought of four makes my head spin know kids means your outnumbered x2 hubby and have hard enough time keeping track of our with we would constantly be misplacing someone when was talking to my dr about getting my tubes tied she tried to talk me out of it what if your son dies or if you get remarried and your husband wants one nope and done unfortunately was unable to get my tubes tied for medical reasons and now cant afford oh wow she holier than thou sanctimommy did not see that coming ugh as if you never thought about those scenarios and that question will lead you to sudden realization that will make you immediately rethink your decision apparently non existent husbands want where more important then my medically necessary choice should have kids my body is built for it in any way somehow managed after multiple miscarriages and he was an emergency csection because my hips will not separate for birth its amazing he is here today but that not enough for my dr had an appointment with my ob at my two week pp checkup as she was checking my section incision she asked so do you want to start any sort of birth control told her my husband was getting vasectomy soon and she was like oh goodness are you sure what if you want more kids in the future why not just go ahead with the birth control just in case it less permanent and you guys are still so young now love her she been great but this genuinely pissed me off not only because the newborn stage has been hell but also have pretty severe ppd we know what we want and we ve always known what we want one baby we know the ppd will pass and we know the newborn stage isn forever but there not one part of us that wants to do this again if we change our minds later on by some miracle then so be it we ll deal with our decision we love our son to pieces but we really don want another one and the vasectomy decision didn come to us lightly so why the hell did she feel the need to ask me if sure we knew we wanted one even before we brought him home from the hospital and reality set in just accept what telling you and don try to guilt me into having more kids didn mean to go on such rant but this happened recently and it still bit fresh and still salty about it lmao that is so unprofessional am one and done and no medical professional has ever passed judgement would report it if possible am sorry it is very tough dealing with everyone asking when is your next then having to explain had high risk pregnancy you really want to hear about me bleeding in the hospital and staying there weeks prior to delivery people need to keep that question judgement to themselves gt woman in her late 50 there your issue 🙄🙄 me thinks she has at least one child of her own that either has too many kids or not enough kids would tell your kid normal doctor and call the practice she based out of to complain she does get to shame you for using your own reproductive rights just because she professional and loath to use that word because this encounter was anything but professional so sorry you had to deal with that completely understand wanting bigger family but having to accept that one amp done is what is best for all of you in the long run it hard removed the second thing kinda get mean sure often people want kids with new partner that shouldn invalidate your decision if you re certain though but what if your son dies as if you re just going to replace him with new one you might end up wanting more kids but it would be long and hard decision and it wouldn be to replace the first one it makes me cringe soooo hard when people talk about which sex their future children will be know someone who literally had kids before they had girl mean they had because they were trying for girl but six boys and they tried again no matter what there would be more they knew that there was only like percent chance of my son coming out ok and he almost didnt fictional hypothetical male was more important than the real female person in front of them that is very sad do think that particularly uncommon occurrence either removed hate that you have to do that do know what to say right now since my kid is lean on dr said it too soon to have another kid but soon that real medical reason wont apply want another but my husband does at all still coming to terms with that since he did bring up one and done until after our baby was born and yes literally went through list asking all the recommended questions when we were engaged and mentioned kids then and for years before and after so to say surprised he went along until now is an understatement hate that people think it okay to ask such personal questions when they barely know or see you my son is autistic non verbal doesn understand english so safety is huge issue because stop goes right over his head won sign still sleeps in my bed at otherwise he doesn stop crying still struggles to stay asleep without screaming can even let me go to the bathroom without shrieking won eat most foods due to his sensory processing issues and his occupational therapist had the audacity to tell me that need to hurry up and give him sibling excuse me spend 20 hours week with him in aba can leave him without meltdown so haven been to the dentist or literally anywhere need to go have no self care options because he always with me and supposed to have another right now and she didn just say it once it was all the time don know how people think it is their business to be involved in if someone should have any or more children what if someone had been trying for years and couldn and then you say that so sorry that happened to you so unprofessional wouldn say she was shaming you but it definitely not her place wish people would realize that there can be more beneath the surface usually just say our family is complete love that statement because it does leave wiggle room for not having time or resources used to say the same excuses as you but the reality is our family really is complete and there is *nothing* wrong with having one child either way would go back to that pediatrician she sounds super judgemental of parents she should be focused on the care of her patients am sorry she made you feel bad my hubby basically did the same thing and it taken lot of time for me to come to terms with it when we were dating engaged made it clear that not having kids was dealbreaker for me and preferably wanted he was in the could have kids or could not and be happy camp at that time so agreed that getting married meant that we would have kids amp x200b months after having our son he sat me down and firmly said he was one and done he phrases it as was between and child you wanted so think if fair that we compromised on he stated all his reasons why could not argue with any of his reasons they were all perfectly valid we do have wonderful son and great life and choose to focus on that instead of the what if of having 2nd years in ok with our decision as said to girlfriend if wanted another child would have to get divorce and find another guy to have that child with and love my husband more than want another child amp x200b would have 2nd in heartbeat if he ever changed is mind do see that happening get this line of thinking thrown at me your next child should be boy wtf ok do you know how even on chromosomal level this isn up to me do you kinda feel bad for numbers they have to go through their whole lives knowing that they re only around because their parents were trying for girl ca be good for your psychology inappro borderline jnmilitw if only you met the dil feel exactly as you stated to your friend except it was this week so you can probably guess where am emotionally also had an easy pregnancy and delivery so it also feels bonkers to not have second kid when want one and we conceived easily etc the hardest was postpartum but that because mybaby came at 35 weeks and was alone from the afternoon our son came home as in he drove us home from the hospital and left for work ugh so inappropriate and shitty would report her it took me year to get pregnant so at this point would be happy if could choose to get pregnant again at all you sound like me years ago except my son was born 39 week days so another perfect part of my labor delivery story your hubby sounds the same as mine too dropped us off and went to work one of his reasons for only having is because he is workaholic and wanted to find balance between work and family and he did feel he could do that with more than one child again valid point that can not discount amp x200b for my family things have worked out wonderfully we have found good balance and with my son getting older have been able to experience so many things that would be much more difficult if we had another baby to take care of so for us it been good decision hope it will be for you as well removed ok first feel you get annoyed having other people tell me what to do however since there are so many people here who are saying things like report her and whatever feel obligated to balance the scale even though agree with you dunno reddit is such an echo chamber feel the need to go against the grain sometimes not all older people adapt with the times mean does anyone here have grandparents we ourselves are going to be as backwards in 20 30 years time as this person is hopefully we will try to minimize it but even progressive old people struggle wish our generation and theirs would be more conscientious about our respective faults we are human after all do we really have to get so offended when someone from older generation stumbles on believe of their time to me she was paying compliment for being such good mom be happy that someone noticed pat yourself on the back and smile nod at the rest of the nonsense feel free to respectful of disagree but do expect someone else to change this is how we treat dear old granny should she be reported for this man that extreme to suggest that would be as extreme as her belief that everyone should have dozens of children dunno do think it necessarily horrible ve known several families that did stop until they had one of each sex ie five boys and then girl and all of them had the attitude the more the merrier they got shamed for having lots of kids and it good excuse to have when someone pulls out the inevitable you know how that happens right or when are you guys gon na stop when left the hospital after having my first babies triplets we said bye to the doctor and he said see you soon we laughed and said we are done he laughed and said see you soon well got pregnant again the same week as the year before like to think that whenever professional or anyone really speculates about this topic it because they ve seen people happy with kids it not that they don think you re happy with one but that they think you be happier with more try to keep negativity at bay by believing that people that say awful sounding things come from good place—even if it place can understand this feels complaint worthy if dr makes you feel that way instead of professionally explaining your options think you should make formal complaint just pop um out like tee shirt cannon my go to answer for people that keep pushing is what makes you think we have tried has dark enough implications that it shuts people up usually get the same thing but from family members too my son is only year old and can tell you how many times since he been born that have heard the when are you having another come out of someone mouth it makes me crazy personally don want any more kids my entire first pregnancy was miserable and my sons birth was traumatizing and recovery was even worse my husband wants more but not too fond of the idea obviously open too it maybe once my son is bit older but can understand your frustration it as if having kids is walk in the park my mom has asked me my sister friends my in laws and when say no it the same well you have to give him sibling the discussion came up around my mother in law once and she flat out said oh you don wan na raise an only child love my son more than anything in the world but do not want another any time soon my brother has kids and they re literally always looking for one or trying to keep track bonus though the older two or three are old enough to help keep track lol would say tell your doctor and file formal complaint had nurse who overstepped her boundaries in phone conversation and would stop was so shook just waited until calmed down and called the front desk of the practice later and asked how to file formal complaint against someone who worked there the front desk person got very formal apologized that had bad experience and said she was the formal person to file complaints she took all the information even if it does appear to do anything from there this doctor will have strike against them that will hopefully be reviewed and taken into consideration if enough complaints are filed amp x200b am getting so many questions and my son is only can relate sorry you had to go through this come join us at oneanddone pregnant with and we re not finding out the sex until birth just like with my son get so many hope it girl dumbass comments it is what it is and just hope the baby is healthy and gets here safely removed frankly it not even an option for the vast majority of people who are doing ivf most ivf patients are insanely grateful if they have successful pregnancy and having second one is never something you ll take for granted as an ivf patient having four guess some ivf patients do have four kids but considering that it very expensive treatment for infertility and the odds of each cycle working out is at best one in three doubt there many also most ethics boards will not allow gender selection unless parents are carriers for genetic disease that only disproportionately affects one gender gross one of my postpartum nurses gave me whole rant about how lucky was and how she could have kids and she prays to god about it and so blessed blah blah blah well an atheist and was on steep downslope into several weeks of crippling postpartum anxiety did not need to hear any of that healthcare worker myself and while we are people and we try to relate to our patients as fellow humans there is line past which it can be inappropriate to be fair my husband was afraid he lose his job he has better job now with much nicer more considerate boss who also has family we did the same and got the same comments and started telling people was sure it was boy just to get them to shut up turns out it was girl and my husband had vasectomy we were only having no matter what and everyone is like oh yeah since you have of each you don need to have anymore uhhhh thanks eyeroll best wishes on healthy baby should have stopped at one not that do love my second daughter but my second bought of ppd turned into full on chronic depression could have done without that holy hell there rude and then there just stupid what is wrong with people exactly congrats agree with your sentiment and if this were random person at the grocery store agree with you 100 but medical professional especially pediatrician should be expected to have certain level of professionalism and neutrality about the choices of different families report her doesn necessarily mean to the medical licensing board which this type of complaint probably wouldn qualify for anyway but this person needs to be informed that her words were very inappropriate whether that an email to the practice manager online review etc that disgusting good for her but no one goes through med might not have the best social etiquette good thing she not your son pediatrician it would make going to appointments horrible tell everyone the same thing including my son if my husband wants more kids then he can divorce me and make family with another woman no one pushes the subject after that thanks six years the first time for me and then thought it would be good idea to have another baby what could go wrong oh yeeeaaah yeah literally have help with my kid outside of his dad and it tough to just do credits for my undergrad ughhh that would kill me because would love another and there no way could convince my husband removed medical professionals are people too part of the profession is developing rapport and making small talk it seems to me this one is dating herself what has this world come to when we are ready to hang generally nice person based off of comment she believes will increase the happiness of the recipient yes it unwelcome but man can we not treat it the same way we would if someone was genuinely rude to us my old ob gyn had stop taking patients for 15 years because he was planning on retiring many docs have to pay malpractice insurance until the kids they deliver are 18 because of ligation rules that favor the patient then he agrees to take me on because had whole mess of issues it was so clear to me he had done medical history in very long time and said some things that rubbed me the wrong way because he was specialist in this field stayed with him and learned it was just his age he was my biggest advocate in the end he faxed images of my baby about my husband having gotten vasectomy you guys make such beautiful babies and was shocked wonder if the eldest child or eldest daughter got stuck doing most of the parenting of the youngest about my traumatic miscarriage and how really wanted two children but just ca risk my health because my child needs me as doctor especially she should know that even people who want more children emotionally devastating comment like that could be to family that struggles with fertility and just hooooooold eye contact once they look away please do do it again people do this because they do get it they ve never been here where we are it is not our job to educate them but am teacher so take it upon myself to do so my ob recommenced get final after my second got pregnant on birth control and spent over month in the hospital because of blood pressure and then almost had stroke with him he said he was so sad he had to recommend it because we had the cutest tiny babies tiny because developed preeclampsia and iugr with both he made the choice so much harder really wanted kids and finding out my second was boy and would never have girl was devastating our pediatrician asked at my babies month appointment when we planned on trying for girl and just broke down crying right then please start replying with just hope neither of us die in childbirth in the most deadpan voice possible it really comforting to me to see someone else think they should have stopped at one always feel little guilty for thinking it but my second pregnancy wrecked my body and my postpartum ocd was insane and just dealt with it alone for year because thought my kids would be taken away if confided in anyone things are good now but there no way doing that again mean it was obviously meant as compliment but on the same token it was definitely boundary breach my parents wanted more than one and tried for while but couldn so they very unexpectedly had an only child they were sad but never knew it was always told that was so special they didn need more go with that with your son it took us while to conceive our first and even longer for the second our parents mostly kept their opinions and questions to themselves but one phone conversation with my mil had me seething because she kept coming back to us having second child so noted well it not for lack of trying suddenly she was able to leave it alone again it is no ones business not even your dr how many kids you want the dr was wrong but it seems it was salt on the wound as you want another and your husband does not oh my god think have walked out had not been frozen in utter shock wow my ob gyn told me shouldn be having more kids and that it would be concerning for my health to add to my one child only wanted one so that cool too but man wouldn have handled that situation very well have been claws out super rude yeah not only was my second worse as far as ppd goes also developed asthma never had it before the second pregnancy and then boom three decades into my life suddenly an asthmatic hate to find out what third would do to my body not to mention my brain absolutely hate when people ask if were having another it was worse when my kiddo was little she just turned so people dont ask anymore had really bad postpartum episode where if hadnt gotten help when needed it id probably have walked into traffic or something terrible absolutely do not want to go through that again people have actually told me that it easier with the second yeah well unless have some kind of contract with the god of easy babies there no way risk that again what are you talking about it as simple as keeping the womb extremely warm for two days after sex and then extremely cold for five months jokes aside sorry you went through this try not to take her judgment too hard there nothing wrong with one kid nice tell that to my husband balls hmm know of doctor with kids and she catholic probably not coincidentally the be fruitful and multiply was certainly being pushed on you there she seems really burnt out from seeing bad parenting and likely some sad cases but that no excuse to unleash that turmoil onto you was weasley move wtf inappropriate who are all these other people asking you too folks in your area need to mind their own business
